title: 16. The operations manager has asked you to identify the IAM users with Project Editor role on the GCP production project. What should you do?
alternatives: A. Turn on IAM Audit logging and build a Cloud Monitoring dashboard to display this information.
B. Extract all project-wide SSH keys.
C. Execute gcloud projects get-iam-policy to retrieve this information.
D. Check the permissions assigned in all Identity Aware Proxy (IAP) tunnels.
